attributes.action: sack Alan Johnson and appoint a Home Secretary who is able to act with competence, honesty, and integrity, and who will display proper regard for justice and human rights, for expert opinion, for Parliament, and for the interests of the British people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is our belief that Alan Johnson has shown, in his behaviour regarding Professor Nutt, and regarding the extradition of Gary McKinnon, that he does not possess the necessary qualities required by his Office, and as such, should be removed from post immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
